### BLACKBOX.AI

I'll create a beautiful wedding invitation website for Saurabh and Komal with a cartoon bride and groom, no venue mentioned, and the date clearly displayed on February 5, 2026. Here's the complete HTML file with embedded CSS and JavaScript:

`wedding_invitation.html`
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Saurabh & Komal's Wedding</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Dancing+Script:wght@400;700&family=Montserrat:wght@300;400;600&display=swap');
        
        :root {
            --primary: #e11d48;
            --secondary: #f9a8d4;
            --accent: #fef08a;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            background-color: #fff9f9;
            color: #333;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }
        
        .couple-names {
            font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
            background: linear-gradient(to right, #e11d48, #d946ef);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent;
            text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        
        .date-box {
            background: white;
            border: 2px dashed #e11d48;
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }
        
        .couple-image {
            filter: drop-shadow(0 10px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1));
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .couple-image:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }
        
        .floral-decoration::before, .floral-decoration::after {
            content: "‚ùÄ";
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin: 0 0.5rem;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="min-h-screen">
    <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-12">
        <!-- Header with decorative elements -->
        <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <div class="floral-decoration text-lg">Wedding Invitation</div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Main content -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden p-8 md:p-12">
            <!-- Couple names -->
            <h1 class="text-center text-5xl md:text-6xl font-bold mb-8 couple-names">
                Saurabh & Komal
            </h1>
            
            <!-- Wedding date -->
            <div class="date-box text-center py-4 px-6 rounded-lg mb-10 max-w-xs mx-auto">
                <div class="text-sm uppercase tracking-widest text-gray-500">We're Getting Married On</div>
                <div class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-600">5th February 2026</div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Cartoon couple illustration -->
            <div class="flex justify-center mb-12">
                <img 
                    src="https://placehold.co/500x300" 
                    alt="Cartoon illustration of a happy bride and groom, the bride wearing a beautiful white dress with lace details, the groom in a sharp black tuxedo, both smiling happily with floral decoration around them" 
                    class="couple-image rounded-lg w-full max-w-md"
                >
            </div>
            
            <!-- Formal invitation text -->
            <div class="text-center max-w-2xl mx-auto mb-10">
                <p class="text-lg mb-6">Together with their families</p>
                <p class="text-2xl font-light italic mb-6">
                    Request the pleasure of your company<br>
                    as they exchange vows and begin their new life together
                </p>
                <p class="text-lg mt-8">
                    Your blessings and presence would mean the world to us
                </p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Countdown timer -->
            <div class="text-center mt-12">
                <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4 text-gray-600">Counting down to the big day</h3>
                <div id="countdown" class="flex justify-center gap-4">
                    <div class="bg-pink-100 rounded-lg p-3 w-20">
                        <div id="days" class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-700">00</div>
                        <div class="text-xs uppercase text-gray-500">Days</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-pink-100 rounded-lg p-3 w-20">
                        <div id="hours" class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-700">00</div>
                        <div class="text-xs uppercase text-gray-500">Hours</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-pink-100 rounded-lg p-3 w-20">
                        <div id="minutes" class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-700">00</div>
                        <div class="text-xs uppercase text-gray-500">Minutes</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-pink-100 rounded-lg p-3 w-20">
                        <div id="seconds" class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-700">00</div>
                        <div class="text-xs uppercase text-gray-500">Seconds</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Footer -->
        <div class="text-center mt-8 text-gray-500 text-sm">
            Save the Date ‚Ä¢ 05.02.2026
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Countdown timer
        function updateCountdown() {
            const weddingDate = new Date('February 5, 2026 00:00:00').getTime();
            const now = new Date().getTime();
            const distance = weddingDate - now;
            
            const days = Math.floor(distance / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
            const hours = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
            const minutes = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
            const seconds = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
            
            document.getElementById('days').innerHTML = days;
            document.getElementById('hours').innerHTML = hours;
            document.getElementById('minutes').innerHTML = minutes;
            document.getElementById('seconds').innerHTML = seconds;
            
            setTimeout(updateCountdown, 1000);
        }
        
        // Start the countdown when page loads
        window.onload = updateCountdown;
        
        // Confetti effect when clicking on the couple image
        document.querySelector('.couple-image').addEventListener('click', function() {
            // Simple confetti effect
            const colors = ['#e11d48', '#f9a8d4', '#fef08a'];
            for (let i = 0; i < 50; i++) {
                const confetti = document.createElement('div');
                confetti.style.position = 'fixed';
                confetti.style.width = Math.random() * 10 + 'px';
                confetti.style.height = Math.random() * 10 + 'px';
                confetti.style.backgroundColor = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)];
                confetti.style.borderRadius = '50%';
                confetti.style.left = Math.random() * window.innerWidth + 'px';
                confetti.style.top = (window.innerHeight + 100) + 'px';
                confetti.style.zIndex = '9999';
                confetti.style.transform = 'rotate(' + Math.random() * 360 + 'deg)';
                document.body.appendChild(confetti);
                
                // Animate confetti
                const animation = confetti.animate(
                    [
                        { top: (window.innerHeight + 100) + 'px', opacity: 1 },
                        { top: -100 + 'px', opacity: 0 }
                    ],
                    {
                        duration: Math.random() * 3000 + 2000,
                        easing: 'cubic-bezier(0.1,0.8,0.9,1)'
                    }
                );
                
                animation.onfinish = () => confetti.remove();
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Saurabh & Komal's Wedding</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Dancing+Script:wght@400;700&family=Montserrat:wght@300;400;600&display=swap');
        
        :root {
            --primary: #e11d48;
            --secondary: #f9a8d4;
            --accent: #fef08a;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            background-color: #fff9f9;
            color: #333;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }
        
        .couple-names {
            font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
            background: linear-gradient(to right, #e11d48, #d946ef);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent;
            text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        
        .date-box {
            background: white;
            border: 2px dashed #e11d48;
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }
        
        .couple-image {
            filter: drop-shadow(0 10px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1));
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .couple-image:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }
        
        .floral-decoration::before, .floral-decoration::after {
            content: "‚ùÄ";
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin: 0 0.5rem;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="min-h-screen">
    <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-12">
        <!-- Header with decorative elements -->
        <div class="text-center mb-8">
            <div class="floral-decoration text-lg">Wedding Invitation</div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Main content -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden p-8 md:p-12">
            <!-- Couple names -->
            <h1 class="text-center text-5xl md:text-6xl font-bold mb-8 couple-names">
                Saurabh & Komal
            </h1>
            
            <!-- Wedding date -->
            <div class="date-box text-center py-4 px-6 rounded-lg mb-10 max-w-xs mx-auto">
                <div class="text-sm uppercase tracking-widest text-gray-500">We're Getting Married On</div>
                <div class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-600">5th February 2026</div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Cartoon couple illustration -->
            <div class="flex justify-center mb-12">
                <img 
                    src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/98cf3c10-a968-4004-b2ca-a40326cc73dd.png" 
                    alt="Cartoon illustration of a happy bride and groom, the bride wearing a beautiful white dress with lace details, the groom in a sharp black tuxedo, both smiling happily with floral decoration around them" 
                    class="couple-image rounded-lg w-full max-w-md"
                >
            </div>
            
            <!-- Formal invitation text -->
            <div class="text-center max-w-2xl mx-auto mb-10">
                <p class="text-lg mb-6">Together with their families</p>
                <p class="text-2xl font-light italic mb-6">
                    Request the pleasure of your company<br>
                    as they exchange vows and begin their new life together
                </p>
                <p class="text-lg mt-8">
                    Your blessings and presence would mean the world to us
                </p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Countdown timer -->
            <div class="text-center mt-12">
                <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4 text-gray-600">Counting down to the big day</h3>
                <div id="countdown" class="flex justify-center gap-4">
                    <div class="bg-pink-100 rounded-lg p-3 w-20">
                        <div id="days" class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-700">00</div>
                        <div class="text-xs uppercase text-gray-500">Days</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-pink-100 rounded-lg p-3 w-20">
                        <div id="hours" class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-700">00</div>
                        <div class="text-xs uppercase text-gray-500">Hours</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-pink-100 rounded-lg p-3 w-20">
                        <div id="minutes" class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-700">00</div>
                        <div class="text-xs uppercase text-gray-500">Minutes</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-pink-100 rounded-lg p-3 w-20">
                        <div id="seconds" class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-700">00</div>
                        <div class="text-xs uppercase text-gray-500">Seconds</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Footer -->
        <div class="text-center mt-8 text-gray-500 text-sm">
            Save the Date ‚Ä¢ 05.02.2026
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Countdown timer
        function updateCountdown() {
            const weddingDate = new Date('February 5, 2026 00:00:00').getTime();
            const now = new Date().getTime();
            const distance = weddingDate - now;
            
            const days = Math.floor(distance / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
            const hours = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
            const minutes = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
            const seconds = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
            
            document.getElementById('days').innerHTML = days;
            document.getElementById('hours').innerHTML = hours;
            document.getElementById('minutes').innerHTML = minutes;
            document.getElementById('seconds').innerHTML = seconds;
            
            setTimeout(updateCountdown, 1000);
        }
        
        // Start the countdown when page loads
        window.onload = updateCountdown;
        
        // Confetti effect when clicking on the couple image
        document.querySelector('.couple-image').addEventListener('click', function() {
            // Simple confetti effect
            const colors = ['#e11d48', '#f9a8d4', '#fef08a'];
            for (let i = 0; i < 50; i++) {
                const confetti = document.createElement('div');
                confetti.style.position = 'fixed';
                confetti.style.width = Math.random() * 10 + 'px';
                confetti.style.height = Math.random() * 10 + 'px';
                confetti.style.backgroundColor = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)];
                confetti.style.borderRadius = '50%';
                confetti.style.left = Math.random() * window.innerWidth + 'px';
                confetti.style.top = (window.innerHeight + 100) + 'px';
                confetti.style.zIndex = '9999';
                confetti.style.transform = 'rotate(' + Math.random() * 360 + 'deg)';
                document.body.appendChild(confetti);
                
                // Animate confetti
                const animation = confetti.animate(
                    [
                        { top: (window.innerHeight + 100) + 'px', opacity: 1 },
                        { top: -100 + 'px', opacity: 0 }
                    ],
                    {
                        duration: Math.random() * 3000 + 2000,
                        easing: 'cubic-bezier(0.1,0.8,0.9,1)'
                    }
                );
                
                animation.onfinish = () => confetti.remove();
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```
